bidder.translation[0].definitions[0].def: someone who offers to pay a particular amount of money for something that is being sold
bidder.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The antiques will be sold to the highest bidder  (=the person who offers to pay the most).
bidder.translation[0].definitions[1].def: someone who offers to do work or provide services for a particular amount of money, in competition with others
bidder.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: one of 13 bidders for the contract
